external_games.name: Train Simulator: Long Island Rail Road: New York – Hicksville Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Long Island Rail Road - New York: Hicksville Route
summary: America’s busiest, most historic, and legendary commuter railroad – the Long Island Rail Road – now comes to Train Simulator Classic! A trio of iconic New York City terminals (Penn Station in Manhattan, Atlantic Avenue in Brooklyn, and Long Island City), across “The Island” to Hicksville, New York.
